column1: #text=Last week I traveled on a train to see my brother .
#text=When my brother 's pregnant wife gave birth to their baby I was excited to see them and their new addition to the family .
#text=They lived 500 miles away in Charlotte , North Carolina .
#text=The cheapest option was to catch a train to go see them .
#text=I arrived at the train station and went to the ticket desk .
#text=He asked me where I would like to go , and I told him where and why .
#text=He pointed me in the direction to the correct platform where my train would departure from .
#text=When I got to the platform , the train was waiting for me .
#text=I handed the attendant my ticket and got on the train .
#text=Now it was time to put my feet back and relax .
#text=In just a few short hours , I arrived in Charlotte , North Carolina and was off to see my new nephew !
